thread.title: Wonderful Experience for daughter's 16th Birthday
thread.title_full: Wonderful Experience for daughter's 16th Birthday - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Battery Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: davidlO4533DO
title: Wonderful Experience for daughter's 16th Birthday
text: The amenities are wonderful. The staff was so considerate and attentive. It was a great place to begin and end each day during our visit to the city celebrating our daughter's 16th Birthday! Our flight was cancelled due to the "blizzard" and the hotel was a wonderfully warm place to hang out, visit with friends and enjoy the snowy day. Thank you so much!
